EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Global_HCE_Forge-Jetwave_Nurture.Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Unbeatable Connected Cabin Combination
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Honeywell JetWave satellite communications system and our new Honeywell Forge cabin connectivity and flight services platform give you the right combination to unlock the full potential of your connected aircraft investment.
JetWave <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/jetwave-business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=nurture]]> gives your passengers the kind of connected experience they’re used to getting on the ground, from the moment they buckle in and during every phase of flight. It’s fast, reliable and available anywhere—even over the ocean.
Honeywell Forge <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/02/the-future-of-business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=nurture]]> complements the JetWave system by giving your flight department everything it needs to get your aircraft connected, keep it connected and enable passengers to stay productive and entertained anywhere they fly.
You consider lots of factors before choosing the connected aircraft solution to meet your needs today and in the future. With the Honeywell approach, you’re making the value-driven choice that you won’t outgrow anytime soon. More Information <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga]]>
